name: intro
text: Bonjour Monsieur. What can I do for you today?

name: a1
text: It's J E A N. A common mistake.

name: a2
text: What do you need little garcon?

name: a3
text: Hmmm... Oh oui oui. You just happen to be in luck. I do carry FIREWOOD and ROSEMARY OIL.

name: a4
text: The FIREWOOD would cost you 6 shillings and hmmm, the ROSEMARY OIL would be 8 shillings.

name: a5
text: Ahh yes, this ROSEMARY OIL is the finest of all in France. I got these during my trip to Marseille. Beautiful place, beautiful people.

name: a6
text: Yes, it's a lovely place. Many beautiful women. So, BEAUT-TI-FUL. MmmmMmmHmm... *chef's kiss* If you ever get the chance you should visit.

name: a7.2
text: Oh oui oui. Sorry Monsieur, just thinking about that place. So many good memories. The ROSEMARY OIL, that will cost you 6 shillings.

name: a7.3
text: Did I say 6 shillings. I mean 8 shillings.

name: a7
text: You and me both garcon. Let me tell you about this gorgeous mademoiselle. Oooo weee... her bosom were magnificent. *more chef's kiss*

name: a8
text: She would give Helen of Troy a run for her shillings. It has been many nights since I last saw her. Oh... what I would give just to see her face again.

name: a9
text: Jean. I miss her dearly.

name: a10
text: She had blonde hair, hazel eyes, freckles that could make a grown man weep, her free spirited lifestyle is intoxicating, something I feel in love with instantly... Also a very passionate lover.

name: a11
text: In Marseille, we would spend every waking moment together. From sunrise to sunset. It would just be Jean and moi... locked away in her room. Two souls intertwined. Two majestic peacocks, flying across the horizon that knows no end. Our love... knew no bounds.

name: a12
text: We were Romeo and Juliet, y'know but without the whole dramatic death sequence. I could have done without that part. Ah, Jean... When I get enough shillings to move out of this dump I will come back for you my love!

name: a13
text: Merci... for listening to my story garcon.

name: a13.2
text: ........... That will be 8 shillings for the ROSEMARY OIL.

name: a12.3
text: 8 shillings for the ROSEMARY OIL or you could look elsewhere!

name: a14
text: Thank you GRENOUILLE. You have made a friend for life. Next time I'm going to Marseille, I'm bringing you along. Jean has a beautiful friend. Perfect for you. Huge bosom.

name: a14.1
text: Here, I want to give you an AMI(friend) discount. 4 shillings each, for both the FIREWOOD and ROSEMARY OIL.

name: b1
text: Ah yes, the FIREWOOD. I can offer it to you for 6 shillings.

name: b2
text: Hmmm. Hmmm. ??? Hmmm. Hmmm. Sure

name: b3
text: What about 6 shillings?

name: b4
text: Sorry little garcon, but I have a trip I am saving up for.

name: b5
text: What do you take me for, a fool?.

name: b6
text: JOHN!!! It's         J            E             A           N!!!!!!!!

name: b6
text: 8 shillings for the FIREWOOD or looks elsewhere littlel garcon.

name: b7
text: Hmm. Fine

name: AMI DISCOUNT
text: I've just acquired a bottle of ROSEMARY OIL!

name: AMI DISCOUNT2
text: I've just acquired FIREWOOD!

name: PURCHASE ROSEMARY OIL
text: I've just acquired a bottle of ROSEMARY OIL!

name: PURCHASE FIREWOOD
text: I've just acquired FIREWOOD!
